con:request.name: Create Account User
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header> <fueloauth xmlns="http://exacttarget.com">${Auth#accesstoken}</fueloauth> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <CreateRequest xmlns="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI"> <Options/> <Objects xsi:type="AccountUser" xmlns="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI"> <Client> <ClientID>${#TestCase#EID}</ClientID> </Client> <PartnerKey xsi:nil="true"/> <ModifiedDate xsi:nil="true"/> <ObjectID xsi:nil="true"/> <AccountUserID xsi:nil="true"/> <UserID>${Create UserID#result}</UserID> <Password>emails11!</Password> <Name>QETesting Core API User</Name> <Email>mc-fuelframeworkdev@salesforce.com</Email> <MustChangePassword>false</MustChangePassword> <ChallengePhrase>q</ChallengePhrase> <ChallengeAnswer>a</ChallengeAnswer> <Delete>0</Delete> <IsAPIUser>true</IsAPIUser> <NotificationEmailAddress>mc-fuelframeworkdev@salesforce.com</NotificationEmailAddress> </Objects> </CreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Disable Account
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header> <fueloauth xmlns="http://exacttarget.com">${Auth#accesstoken}</fueloauth> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <UpdateRequest xmlns="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI"> <Options/> <Objects xsi:type="Account" xmlns="http://exacttarget.com/wsdl/partnerAPI"> <AccountType>CONNECT</AccountType> <Name>QETesting CORE ${Get Today's Date#result}</Name> <Email>jhedges@salesforce.com</Email> <FromName>Jesse Hedges</FromName> <BusinessName>Platform Test Team</BusinessName> <Address>20 N Meridian Street</Address> <City>Indianapolis</City> <State>IN</State> <Zip>46204</Zip> <IsActive>0</IsActive> <DBID>${#Project#dbid}</DBID> <CustomerID>8323</CustomerID> <Subscription> <SubscriptionID xsi:nil="true"/> <EmailsPurchased>50000</EmailsPurchased> <AccountsPurchased>10</AccountsPurchased> <AdvAccountsPurchased>10</AdvAccountsPurchased> <LPAccountsPurchased>10</LPAccountsPurchased> <DOTOAccountsPurchased>10</DOTOAccountsPurchased> <BUAccountsPurchased>10</BUAccountsPurchased> <BeginDate>${Get Today's Date#result}T00:00:00.000Z</BeginDate> <EndDate>${Get Today's Date#result}T23:59:59.999Z</EndDate> <Notes xsi:nil="true"/> <Period/> <NotificationTitle xsi:nil="true"/> <NotificationMessage xsi:nil="true"/> <NotificationFlag xsi:nil="true"/> <NotificationExpDate xsi:nil="true"/> <ForAccounting xsi:nil="true"/> <HasPurchasedEmails>true</HasPurchasedEmails> <NumberofEmails>0</NumberofEmails> </Subscription>
</Objects> </UpdateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
